content:
It’s your chance to win the ultimate NYC getaway for two: a two-night stay in our Penthouse Suite, $500 Gift Card, $150 Food & Beverage credit, Two Massages and Two Fitness classes at Exhale Spa and Styling service for Two at Cutler Salon.

Enter Royalton Park Avenue’s #FeelRoyal Sweepstakes in just two easy steps:

  1. Follow the Royalton Park Avenue on Instagram or Facebook
  2. Submit your entry on the form below by 09/24/2018
